actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1781.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill S. 666 to allow Federal employment preference to certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs, and to certain employees of the Indian Health Service, who are not entitled to the benefits of, or who have been adversely affected by the application of, certain Federal laws allowing employment preference to Indians, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 666 (Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Indian Health Service Employment Preference).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill S. 666 to allow Federal employment preference to certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs, and to certain employees of the Indian Health Service, who are not entitled to the benefits of, or who have been adversely affected by the application of, certain Federal laws allowing employment preference to Indians, and for other purposes.
